properties.query:
// If access was granted by a User (InitiatedByDisplayName), app information will say **User**
// If access was granted by an app (AppId), this information will display for the application used.
// Currently, this analytic is set to remove entries set by App "MS-PIM-Fairfax"
let timeframe = 24h;
let OperationList = dynamic(["Add member to role", "Add member to role in PIM requested (permanent)"]);
let PrivilegedGroups = dynamic(["UserAccountAdmins","PrivilegedRoleAdmins","TenantAdmins"]);
AuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(timeframe)
| where LoggedByService =~ "Core Directory"
| where Category =~ "RoleManagement"
| where OperationName in~ (OperationList)
| mv-expand TargetResources
| extend modifiedProperties = parse_json(TargetResources).modifiedProperties
| mv-expand modifiedProperties
| extend
    DisplayName = tostring(parse_json(modifiedProperties).displayName),
    GroupName =  trim(@'"', tostring(parse_json(modifiedProperties).newValue))
| extend
    AppId = iif(isnotnull(InitiatedBy.app.appId), InitiatedBy.app.appId, "**User**"),
    InitiatedByUserId = iif(isnotnull(InitiatedBy.user.id), InitiatedBy.user.id, "**See AppInitiated Column**"),
    InitiatedByDisplayName = iif(isnotnull(InitiatedBy.app.displayName), InitiatedBy.app.displayName, InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName),
    ServicePrincipalId = iif(isnotnull(InitiatedBy.app.servicePrincipalId), InitiatedBy.app.servicePrincipalId, "**User**"),
    ServicePrincipalName = iif(isnotnull(InitiatedBy.app.servicePrincipalName), InitiatedBy.app.servicePrincipalName, "**User**"),
    TargetUserAdded = iif(isempty(TargetResources.userPrincipalName), TargetResources.displayName, TargetResources.userPrincipalName)
| where DisplayName =~ "Role.WellKnownObjectName"
| where GroupName contains "admins" or GroupName in (PrivilegedGroups)
// If you want to still alert for operations from PIM, remove below filtering for MS-PIM.
| where InitiatedByDisplayName != "MS-PIM-Fairfax"
| extend AppInitiated = pack("AppId", AppId, "ServicePrincipalId", ServicePrincipalId, "ServicePrincipalName", ServicePrincipalName)
| summarize Groups =make_list(GroupName), Count =count()
    by
    AADOperationType,
    OperationName,
    AADTenantId,
    tostring(TargetUserAdded),
    InitiatedByUserId,
    tostring(InitiatedByDisplayName),
    tostring(AppInitiated)
| sort by Count
properties.displayName: User added to Azure Active Directory Privileged Groups
properties.description:
This will alert when a user is added to any of the Privileged Groups.
For further information on AuditLogs please see https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/reports-monitoring/reference-audit-activities.
For Administrator role permissions in Azure Active Directory please see https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/users-groups-roles/directory-assign-admin-roles
PLATFORM:Azure AD,IaaS,Microsoft 365,Windows
MITRE:TA0001;T1078;T1078.001;T1078.004,TA0003;T1078;T1078.004;T1098;T1098.001
